content.raw: Thank you for the explanation. We recognize the value of modeling the real sensor as closely as possible and will accept the RealSense D435i as a new sensor parameter set. The sensor will be modeled using the 69-degree FoV from the RealSense D435i datasheet because it must apply for both RGB and depth data. I will make this change in [PR #338](#!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/388/fix-camera-parameters-for-submitted-models/diff)
content.html: Thank you for the explanation. We recognize the value of modeling the real sensor as closely as possible and will accept the RealSense D435i as a new sensor parameter set. The sensor will be modeled using the 69-degree FoV from the RealSense D435i datasheet because it must apply for both RGB and depth data. I will make this change in PR #338
